name: places/ChIJOWmZX1JZwokRB4Q0hf19vfg
formattedAddress: 127 E 59th St suite 67 3rd Floor, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 127 E 59th St suite 67 3rd Floor, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: I’ve been a client for over two years now. Steven is the best of the best. I’ve visited  many stylist, trying to find what I found at Serrato Style. I have a head full of multiple hair textures on the looser end that don’t quite fit into cookie cutter hair cuts. Steven takes time to consult with you, letting you know what is possible for your unique hair texture. We talk immediate and long term goals before the scissors come out. We’ve tried multiple shapes as I’ve grown out a pixie, and each hair cut grows out beautifully holding its shape for months. I am comfortable in his chair and trust that the end result will be exactly what I came in for or better. Steven is the first stylist (out of many others I’ve visited) that has made me feel like my natural texture(s) are not only something to embrace, but to truly celebrate as beautiful. His dedication, passion and personality makes him an absolute gem in the curly community. We love you!

originalText.text: Steven is an amazing curly cut stylist! He listens to you, gives suggestions/recommendations, and it’s always a good time getting my hair done with him. I highly recommend!!!

text.text: Steven is an amazing curly cut stylist! He listens to you, gives suggestions/recommendations, and it’s always a good time getting my hair done with him. I highly recommend!!!

originalText.text: Steven is a master at his craft and such a delight to be around! When he opened his own salon, I immediately followed him there and will continue to be a loyal customer. He is the only person I trust to give me recommendations on products, cutting and styling my hair. He listens to my ideas and executes on point every time, giving a thorough consult before cutting a single curl. Steven’s space is always clean and has the chillest vibe. I always feel like a new person when I leave his chair - looking forward to my next visit!

originalText.text: Steven is absolutely AMAZING I 100% found my new forever curly cut stylist. I was originally sold on Steven’s talent after seeing the diversity in his clients via his social media (he knows how to care for the girlies with 4c hair!), and seeing him today confirmed that he was a great choice. Steven was extremely knowledgeable, catered to my hair shape/texture and is not scissor happy at all. I have already recommended him to my friends. BOOK HIM ASAP

originalText.text:
If you’re looking for a hair stylist that cares for their client, creates a warm + fun environment, and gives the best curly cuts out there, SERRATO STYLE is the place to be.

He has been my hair stylist for 5 years, and I am endlessly recommending him to my curly community. My friends who recently started going to Serrato Style loooove Steven.  He will not disappoint. Book him!
